name: The Lake of Eyes
description:
(Note: This game is currently in development, and will be subject to change). 

Explore a desolate and foggy lake town as a newly appointed fisherman and unlock the secrets of the murky lake. 

Development Team:

3D Art: Erro Greenwood

2D Art/Animation: Kate Simons

Sound Design/Composition: Michael Hanusiak

Programming/Design: Michael Zatlin Jr. 

Future Additions to the game that will be available by the end of this November:

Complete  NPC dialog system.

Complete story-line. 

Complete objective system.

Added mechanics, such as the ability to repair your damaged boat.

Improved interaction/level transitions.  

Improved difficulty curve of the Cryptid. 

A more polished ending.
